abstract.p: IMC Mortgage Inc, Tampa, Fla, to buy Mortgage America Inc, Bay City, Mich, for an initial payment of about $26.6 million in stock; Service International, Lufkin, Tex, says it will sell its 41.6 percent stake in Equity Corp International; Reynolds Metals Co, Richmond, to sell its North American home building operations to Amerimark Inc, Raleigh, NC, for undisclosed terms (M)

block.p: IMC MORTGAGE INC., Tampa, Fla., will buy Mortgage America Inc., Bay City, Mich., for an initial payment of about $26.6 million in stock.
SERVICE CORP. INTERNATIONAL, Lufkin, Tex., a funeral home operator, said it planned to sell its 41.6 percent stake in Equity Corp. International, Lufkin, a provider of death care services.
REYNOLDS METALS CO., Richmond, agreed to sell its North American home building operations to Amerimark Inc., Raleigh, N.C., for an undis closed amount.
